#text=Baking a cake either for myself or for friends is a fun activity .
#text=I first plan ahead , so I know what kind of cake I will be making and what supplies I will need for that cake .
#text=I prepare my pans , so the cake wo n't stick to the sides or bottom and preheat my oven so that when my batter is mixed it can go right into the oven .
#text=A simple cake will usually require eggs , flower , baking powder and a few other things .
#text=Generally speaking I will mix the wet ingredients in one bowl and the dry in another before mixing them together .
#text=I like to use an industrial strength mixing bowl , as opposed to a hand mixer .
#text=I make sure that it is well mixed with no lumps , but not overly mixed , as that can ruin the batter .
#text=Once the batter is smooth and yummy I pour it into the prepared pans and pop them in the over for about 20-30 minutes .
#text=While the actually baking takes place , I can prepare the frosting .
